interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Murder, She Wrote: Season 2 Review Date: 2014/05/13 Store: Angela Lansbury (Actor), Tom Bosley (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles Product Description: ['Emmy Award nominee Angela Lansbury is back on the case in all 22 episodes of the critically acclaimed series, Murder, She Wrote Season Two. Rejoin Jessica Fletcher, everyone\'s favorite mystery writer, back in Cabot Cove, where she pens her whodunit books and keeps finding that her life is imitating her art. Teamed with some of the biggest guest stars on television, including Jerry Orbach, Adrienne Barbeau, Dick Van Patten and Carol Lawrence, Jessica continues her quest to find the truth in even the murkiest circumstances. Catch the complete second season of Murder, She Wrote, the classic mystery series that "…remains well worth revisiting two decades later" (Josef Adalian, Daily Variety).'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Television, DVD Movie, Blu-ray Movie, Mystery & Suspense', 'Format': 'Box set, Color, Dolby, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'William Windom, Tom Bosley, Angela Lansbury', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.72 x 6.02 x 1.89 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Color, Dolby, Full Screen', 'Run time': '35 hours and 28 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 6, 2005', 'Actors': 'Angela Lansbury, Tom Bosley, William Windom', 'Dubbed': 'French', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: enjoy watching crime stopper with mrs. fletcher
she's exciting to watch
anyone whose interest is in solving crimes will like it
as much as I do. Review Title: murder she wrote Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
The user demonstrates a strong preference for mystery and drama genres, particularly in classic television series. They have a fondness for character-driven narratives, as implied by their enjoyment of a well-known detective figure. The user appreciates engaging storylines that involve crime-solving and seems to resonate with the thrill of unraveling mysteries. Their high rating indicates a positive response to the quality of storytelling and character development.

Additionally, they favor physical media formats like DVD box sets, suggesting a preference for collectible or complete series presentations over streaming solutions. The user prefers content with time-tested appeal, as they enjoy revisiting classic series. A particular interest in influential actors from their selections points to an appreciation for established talent in the industry. Overall, this profile reflects a passion for classic mystery television, strong character narratives, and a commitment to enjoying the nostalgia of past media forms.
